attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt to the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professor Nutt's dismissal is a blatantly unfair and un-democratic decision.  Independent advisors must be allowed to say things that the government may not like - that is why they are independent in the first place.  Professor Nutt should be reinstated immediately, and an apology issued by the government for this decision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
